Vulnerabilities: Leakage of sensitive information (bash history, password)

Steps.Description: Fuzz the challenge site to find more log files using a custom wordlist.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: Expecting to find leaked information or the flag in the logs.
StepDetails.Action: Download all available logs and search for unusual content using grep.
StepDetails.Result: Find leaked bash history and a password.
